name: Blast N Bob
description:
Blast n Bob is a Shooter Game but u can only move by teleporting or swap position with Bob,

Bob is your green friend.

and with Bob You have to kill Red unity default sprite

in order to survive

Theme 

"Joined Together" With Bob will grant you power full ability and  you can  teleport

everywhere

Control

Left click to shoot

Right click to teleport

This Game was Submited for GMTK Gamejam 2021

Ok thats it...
